resources:
Voice Gamev Start game Create new track Settings
High Low
Play again New turn Drive New track MainMenu Game Create new track Hello world! Settings Settings Select speed Choose car color Calibrate microphone Game mode: Save or undo changes Pick up Avoid Hold down the button 'High' while making loud sounds Hold down the button 'Low' while being silent Choose the citizen you want to change to Choose a track Save track Here you can see an image of the track that you are about to save. You have to pick a track first Do you want to save? You have unsaved changes, do you want to save them? Car direction at loud sounds: Up Down tracksFile screenshots Save settings Would you like to save your settings? Cancel Save Do not save
Change track When a track has been selected it can be edited 
by clicking here Play track When a track has been selected it can be played 
by clicking here Delete track When a track has been selected it can be deleted 
by clicking here Tracks Here your tracks are shown. 
New tracks can be created from 
the main menu There are no saved tracks
Save settings Click here to save your changed settings Change the color of the car Click here to change the color of the car Calibrate microphone Here the microphone is calibrated. Hold down 
the button "High" and make a loud sound, or hold 
down the button "Low" and be silent.
Let go of the button after this Change the cars speed Click on the ruler to change the speed of the car,
higher speed is equal to higher difficulty Game mode Choose between stars and boxes for your track. 
Stars has to be picked up while boxes needs to 
be avoided Car direction Choose either up or down to decide which way 
the car drives with sound present
Delete changes Click here to delete all new settings Save track Click here to save the track Screen click Click on the track to insert either stars or boxes.
You can choose between these in settings
english
